head: Home
introduction-p1: Cool Chinese Restaurant is a well-known home style restaurant from Kunming, Yunnan, China, which focuses on promoting classic local flavors to all corners of the world. Now, Cool Chinese Restaurant combines its unique traditional cooking techniques with modern urban life concepts to come to beautiful Vancouver.
introduction-p2: You can enjoy foods from thousands of miles away just in Vancouver.
name: Name
member-regular: Regular member: Pay 10 dollars to become a member, get 10 dollars coupon immediately
member-premium: Premium member: Spend 1000 dollars or deposit into membership account to have 10% off
member-platinum-item1: Spend 1000 dollars or deposit into membership account to have 12% off
member-platinum-item2: Platinum members will recieve a give on their birthday when come to the restaurant
member-platinum-item3-title: Platinum members will have the following benifits:
member-diamond-item1: Spend 5000 dollars or deposit into membership account to recieve all benifits above
member-diamond-item2-title: Diamond members will have the following benifits:
member-diamond-item2-item1: No minimum speding for private rooms
member-diamond-item2-item2: No parking fee (ask the front desk for payback)
member-diamond-item2-item4: One of free alcohol, drink or side dish on the day become diamond member
membership-score-item1: 1 score for every 10 dollars of spending
membership-score-item2-title: Scores can be used to upgrade membership level:
membership-score-item2-item1: 100 scores to upgrade to Premium Member
membership-score-item2-item2: 300 scores to upgrade to Platinum Member
membership-score-item2-item3: 500 scores to upgrade to Diamond Member
membership-score-payback: Every 100 scores can have 10 dollars cashback
membership-score-extra: Scores can be used to exchange bevarages or dishes, items available change by season, please add Cool Chinese Restaurant's Wechat for more detail
